rules.title: Verify Patient Status
rules.action: Inquire if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient, or have you visited us before?

rules.title: New Patient Dental Insurance Inquiry
rules.action: Ask if the patient has dental insurance.
rules.example: Since you're a new patient, do you have dental insurance?

rules.title: Request Insurance Provider Name
rules.action: Ask for the full name of their dental insurance provider.
rules.example: Great, what is the name of your dental insurance company?

rules.title: Determine Insurance Network Status
rules.condition: Dental insurance provider name is obtained.
rules.action: Check internal records to determine if the provider is in-network or out-of-network.
rules.example: Let me quickly check our system for [Insurance Company Name].

rules.title: Inform Out-of-Network Status
rules.condition: Insurance is determined to be out-of-network.
rules.action: Clearly inform the patient that their insurance is out-of-network.
rules.example: Unfortunately, [Insurance Company Name] is out-of-network with our practice.

rules.title: Inform Non-Contracted Insurance Payment Policy
rules.condition: Patient's insurance is determined to be out-of-network or a non-contracted plan (e.g., HMO). This rule replaces the 'Decline HMO Plans' rule.
rules.action: Inform the patient that the practice accepts their insurance but requires full upfront payment for services, and their insurance provider will reimburse them directly.
rules.example: Although [Insurance Company Name] is out-of-network with our practice / an HMO plan, we can still see you. For non-contracted plans, we require full payment upfront, and your insurance company will reimburse you directly.

rules.title: Confirm Patient Amenability to Payment Policy
rules.condition: The non-contracted insurance payment policy has been explained to the patient.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is agreeable to the upfront payment and direct reimbursement process.
rules.example: Is this arrangement acceptable to you?

rules.title: Inquire About Accepted Plan Type
rules.condition: Dental insurance is determined to be in-network.
rules.action: Ask the patient for their specific plan type (e.g., PPO, HMO).
rules.example: Since we do accept [Insurance Company Name], could you tell me if you have a PPO or an HMO plan?

rules.title: Proceed to Scheduling after Payment Agreement
rules.condition: Patient agrees to the upfront payment and direct reimbursement process for non-contracted insurance.
rules.action: Proceed with scheduling the patient's appointment.
rules.example: Great! Let's find a convenient time for your appointment.

rules.title: Inquire About Appointment Time Preference
rules.condition: Agent is ready to schedule an appointment.
rules.action: Ask the patient for their preference for morning or afternoon appointments.
rules.example: To help me find the best available time, do you generally prefer morning or afternoon appointments?

rules.title: Defer Exact Price Confirmation to Appointment Call
rules.condition: Patient inquires about exact pricing before the appointment is fully scheduled.
rules.action: Inform the patient that exact prices for services will be confirmed when they call to finalize their appointment details.
rules.example: The exact pricing for your visit will be confirmed when you call us to schedule and finalize your appointment.
